text: Huram guarir akɨnimningɨn ingangariba agɨvagha, aning isa Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn azuarimɨn tiar akamɨn boroghɨn aning asara. Egha guarir akɨnir sautɨn amadaghan tughav itim, kamaghɨn a dɨbori, Jakin. Egha notɨn amadaghan tughav itim kamaghɨn a dɨbori, Boas.7:21 Hibrun akamɨn ziar kam Jakin, a mong akar otevir kamɨn mɨn ghu, “God a gamizɨ an oto.” Hibrun akamɨn ziar kam Boas, a mong akar otevir kamɨn mɨn ghu, “Godɨn gavgavim.”
